Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

MIME element (text/plain) 
This spammer is selling pirated software and spamming our newsgroup from
IP 
218.233.251.46 via the Yahoo newsgroups system. Please shut down all
network 
resources abused by this spammer. 
 
 
 
 
This is a SPAM report: 
 
1) Abuse of Hanaro: 
       Spam emailed out from 218.233.251.46 
       Note the apparently forged last Received: lines. 
     NOTE: 218.233.251.46 appears in the Spamhaus.Org Illegal Exploits
Block List (XBL): 
     http://www.spamhaus.org/query/bl?ip=218.233.251.46 
2) Abuse of Yahoo: 
       Spam relayed through 69.147.64.130 (please close relay or
prohibit spammer access!) 
3) Abuse of Sprint router 208.35.174.6/ AT&T router 12.122.10.14/
CNCGROUP-ZHEJIANG (items 1-2): 
     NOTE THAT CNCGROUP is a KNOWN SPAMHAUS - see: 
     http://www.spamhaus.org/sbl/listings.lasso?isp=cncgroup-ha 
   1) Advertised in spam: www.bigsoftwaredealsforless.info
[124.90.225.252] 
   2) Spammer's website: www.bigsoftwaredealsforless.info
[124.90.225.252] (/index_files/) 
4) Abuse of GMail: 
       Abused email address: collection.xbank@gmail.com 
5) Abuse of Net Access Corporation: 
       Spammer's website: www.bestsoftwaredeal.biz [64.247.42.70] 
6) Abuse of Sprint/United Information Service router 144.223.242.126/
Cable & 
   Wireless-Savvis router 204.70.192.145/ CHINANET-CHONGQING: 
     NOTE THAT CHINANET/China Telecom has non-functioning contact info
(ie: 
     anti-spam@ns.chinanet.cn.net) and is a KNOWN SPAMHAUS - see: 
     http://www.spamhaus.org/sbl/listings.lasso?isp=chinanet-gd 
       Abused Domain Name Server: ns2.dnspod.net. [219.152.120.11] 
7) Abuse of Sprint/United Information Service router 144.223.242.126/
Cable & 
   Wireless-Savvis router 204.70.192.86/ CHINANET-JIANGSU: 
     NOTE THAT CHINANET/China Telecom has non-functioning contact info
(ie: 
     anti-spam@ns.chinanet.cn.net) and is a KNOWN SPAMHAUS - see: 
     http://www.spamhaus.org/sbl/listings.lasso?isp=chinanet-gd 
       Abused Domain Name Server: ns1.dnspod.net. [222.184.236.53] 
8) Abuse of Everyones Internet: 
       Spammer's website: www.statcounter.com [207.44.132.133
64.246.52.3 66.98.134.100 
      66.98.146.38 66.98.186.36 69.57.146.78 69.57.152.91] 
9) Abuse of ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.: 
       Spammer's websites: www.statcounter.com [70.85.113.2] 
                           c22.statcounter.com [70.84.191.210] 
 
 
The spam was emailed out from 218.233.251.46. The IP 218.233.251.46 is
on the Hanaro 
    network. 
The spam was then relayed through 69.147.64.130. The IP 69.147.64.130 is
on the Yahoo 
    network. 
 
 
Note the apparently forged last Received: lines. 
 
 
Referenced in the spam: 
    The URL   http://www.bigsoftwaredealsforless.info/dfne   The
hostname 
    www.bigsoftwaredealsforless.info resolves to: 124.90.225.252.
124.90.225.252 is 
    on the Sprint router 208.35.174.6/ AT&T router 12.122.10.14/
CNCGROUP-ZHEJIANG 
    network. The domain bigsoftwaredealsforless.info uses the Name
Servers: 
    ns2.dnspod.net. [219.152.120.11], ns1.dnspod.net. [222.184.236.53]. 
    219.152.120.11 is on the Sprint/United Information Service router 
    144.223.242.126/ Cable & Wireless-Savvis router 204.70.192.145/ 
    CHINANET-CHONGQING network. 222.184.236.53 is on the Sprint/United
Information 
    Service router 144.223.242.126/ Cable & Wireless-Savvis router
204.70.192.86/ 
    CHINANET-JIANGSU network. 
 
The webpage http://www.bigsoftwaredealsforless.info/dfne references
(items 1-4): 
 1) The URL   index_files/style.css   which is 
    http://www.bigsoftwaredealsforless.info/index_files/style.css 
 2) The URL   order.html   which is 
    http://www.bigsoftwaredealsforless.info/order.html 
 3) The URL   http://www.statcounter.com/   The hostname
www.statcounter.com resolves 
    to multiple IPs, such as: 207.44.132.133, 70.85.113.2.
207.44.132.133 is on the 
    Everyones Internet network. 70.85.113.2 is on the ThePlanet.com
Internet 
    Services, Inc. network. 
 4) The URL 
 
http://c22.statcounter.com/counter.php?sc_project=2331416&java=0&securit
y=8534fb13&invisible=0 
      The hostname c22.statcounter.com resolves to: 70.84.191.210.
70.84.191.210 is 
    on the ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. network. 
 
The webpage http://www.bigsoftwaredealsforless.info/order.html
references (2 items): 
 1) The URL   hitter.cgi   which is 
    http://www.bigsoftwaredealsforless.info/hitter.cgi 
 2) The email address   collection.xbank@gmail.com    which is on the
GMail network. 
 
The webpage http://www.bigsoftwaredealsforless.info/hitter.cgi
references: 
    The URL   http://www.bestsoftwaredeal.biz/   The hostname 
    www.bestsoftwaredeal.biz resolves to: 64.247.42.70. 64.247.42.70 is
on the Net 
    Access Corporation network.
